inclusion.criterion: subacute and chronic period (3 months after stroke)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Modified Ashworth scale in the hemiplegic arm with 3 or more spasticity
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No pain in the hemiplegic arm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate stability to walk when healthy arm is immobilized
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Active 20 degrees wrist extension and 10 degrees interphalangeal and metacarpophalangeal extension (these movements should be repeated 3 times in 1 minute)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Active 20-degree wrist extension and 10-degree interphalangeal and metacarpophalangeal extension
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Global aphasia or cognitive disorders that may affect understanding of test instructions
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with major medical problems that may affect participation
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. He smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
